title: Random Encounter - LET ME TELL YOU A STORY
description:
Hello, we are Random Encounter. 

We are an independent rock band from Orlando, Florida consisting of a bassist, two guitarists, a drummer, and an accordionist. And we love the power of the internet. 

We create arranged versions of songs from video games, songs about video games, and songs about the paranormal. 

LET ME TELL YOU A STORY was recorded completely at home.

If you liked the album, check us out at the following links below. 

Official Website: http://randomencounterband.com/
Facebook:
Twitter:

You can also check out all of our releases below: 

If you ever have any questions about us, what we do, how to book us, PLEASE let us know. You can easily get a hold of us at any of the above links. 

Most of all, tell all of your friends about Random Encounter and LET ME TELL YOU A STORY. 

Love, 

Random Encounter.
